name: Winter Worm, Summer Grass
notes:
Uses Steam game data as installed with SteamPlay, since the game doesn't run with SteamPlay.

Save/load functions don't work and settings menu cannot be exited except by quitting the game.
content:
exe: Winter Worm Summer Grass.exe
files:
- steam-data: $STEAM:1194870:/
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/Winter Worm Summer Grass.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: steam-data
- task:
    app: ddr=gdi
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
